summary: A fish deliveryman in Paris becomes involved in a legal battle with his sperm donation children.
cast: José Garcia|Audrey Fleurot|Lucien Jean-Baptiste|Gérard Hernandez|Laurent Mouton|Verino|Arnaud Tsamère|Alice Belaïdi|Solal Forte|François Civil|Douglas Attal|Hugo Dessioux|Alison Wheeler|François Deblock|Gary Mihaileanu|Clément Ducloux|Pablo Pauly|Aurelia Crebessegues|Kévin Rouxel|Marco Garcia|Bertrand Usclat|Marie Béraud|Kim Barres|Jean Senejoux|Luce Mouchel|Mathieu Delarive|Yves Pignot|Marie Berto|Nathalie Vignes|Guillaume Sentou|Romain Lancry|Françoise Miquelis|Jacques Fontanel|Dylan Lemos|Frank Truong|Bing Yin|Azuki|Patrice Cols|Guillaume Serra|Cédric Weber|Isabelle David|Edouard Nébias|Solange Milhaud|Catherine Giron|Françoise Crochant|Jocelyne Jeanssen|Raquel Teliet|Lorenzo Steenhaut|Sacha Issert|Maxime Canat|Marie Courandière|Charles Djengue|Benoit Maerens|Marvin Martin|Carlos Ribeiro|Grégory Gaule|Audrey Quoturi
title: Fonzy
